Prologue.Heading:
{Title}
as of: {Agt.Effective.YMD} ("{Effective Date}")
between {P1.ID.Name.Short} and {P2.ID.Name.Short}
Prologue.ThisAgreement: This {Title} is made as of {Effective.YMD} by and between {P1.ID.N,E,A} and {P2.ID.N,E,A}.
Prologue.NowTherefore: NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the premises and promises of {this Agreement}, the {parties} hereby agree
Signature.Witness: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the {parties} have executed {this Agreement} to be effective as of {Effective.YMD}.
